channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 59
channel.description:
[Episode 59 is now available][1], in which Ian and Andrey talk about photography, Userscape’s new employee, health insurance, Finsumi, building everything yourself, outsourcing, Quantic Insights, C++, customer support, working from home, audiobooks, and video games.
Thanks to the [Release Notes Conference][2] for sponsoring this episode. Get $100 off when you use the code **bootstrapped**.
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-59/ [2]: http://releasenotes.tv/conference

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 59
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
SteveMcLeod:

Maybe Europe is the dream location for micro-entrepreneurs after all

Yes.

Now as long as they fix the VAT mess…

Read full topic

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 59
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
I like that my second favourite podcast is becoming more frequent. For that reason alone I like it when you have sponsors.

Hearing you both kvetch about health insurance had me - and probably plenty of others - glad I’m not running my show in the USA. Maybe Europe is the dream location for micro-entrepreneurs after all

Read full topic
